articles.description: Apple's current 10.2-inch iPad has dropped to a record-low $290 at Amazon..
articles.content: You'll want to act quickly if you've been looking for a frill-free tablet. Amazon is selling Apple's latest 10.2-inch iPad (that is, the 2021 model) at an all-time low price of $290 after an instant … [+1319 chars]
